text: Ara tomara akanksa karo na emana saba bisaye yate allaha taâ€™ala tomadera ekera upara aparera sresthatba dana karechena. Purusa ya arjana kare seta tara ansa ebam nari ya arjana kare seta tara ansa. Ara allahara kache tamra anugraha prarthana kara. Nihsandehe allaha taâ€™ala sarba bisaye jnata.
